ED_Title: Appointment of the members of the Credentials Committee
ED_DecisionText:
At its 1st plenary meeting, on 12 September 2017, the General Assembly, in accordance with rule 28 of its rules of procedure, appointed a Credentials Committee for its seventy-second session consisting of the following Member States: CABO VERDE, CHINA, DOMINICA, INDONESIA, IRELAND, RUSSIAN FEDERATION, UGANDA, URUGUAY and UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. 


(See A/72/PV.1)
ED_Disclaimer: The text of this decision is available in all languages in document A/72/49 (Vol. II).
